channel.title: [317] Adding ::master [317]
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to add ::master in my 317?
Thanks, ElmosWorld

item.title: [317] Adding ::master [317]
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

If that doesnt work use this 1 that Arham posted first.

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:386163”]Find if (command) and above it put:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
addSkillXP(14910000, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);
addSkillXP(14910000, 5);
addSkillXP(14910000, 6);
addSkillXP(14910000, 7);
addSkillXP(14910000, 8);
addSkillXP(14910000, 9);
addSkillXP(14910000, 10);
addSkillXP(14910000, 11);
addSkillXP(14910000, 12);
addSkillXP(14910000, 13);
addSkillXP(14910000, 14);
addSkillXP(14910000, 15);
addSkillXP(14910000, 16);
addSkillXP(14910000, 17);
addSkillXP(14910000, 18);
addSkillXP(14910000, 19);
addSkillXP(14910000, 20);
addSkillXP(14910000, 21);
addSkillXP(14910000, 22);
addSkillXP(14910000, 23);
}[/quote]

item.title: [317] Adding ::master [317]
item.dc:creator: @ElmosWorld ElmosWorld
item.description:
@ElmosWorld wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:6, topic:386163”][quote author=chri55w link=topic=481922.msg3529337#msg3529337 date=1300046985]
use a loop and also remember to refresh skill afterwards, would also be an idea to check if player is in wild like so:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 1) { if (c.inWild() && c.playerRights == 1) return; if (c.arenas() && c.playerRights == 1) return; for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if ((c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) && c.playerRights == 1) { c.sendMessage("Please remove all your equipment before using this command."); return; } } for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } }

that will check if player is in wildy or duel arena and also make the player unequip all items
[/quote]
Just use this.[/quote]Not working has errors.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding ::master [317]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“chri55w, post:5, topic:386163”]use a loop and also remember to refresh skill afterwards, would also be an idea to check if player is in wild like so:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 1) { if (c.inWild() && c.playerRights == 1) return; if (c.arenas() && c.playerRights == 1) return; for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if ((c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) && c.playerRights == 1) { c.sendMessage("Please remove all your equipment before using this command."); return; } } for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } }

that will check if player is in wildy or duel arena and also make the player unequip all items[/quote]
Just use this.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding ::master [317]
item.dc:creator: @chri55w chri55w
item.description:
@chri55w wrote:

use a loop and also remember to refresh skill afterwards, would also be an idea to check if player is in wild like so:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 1) { if (c.inWild() && c.playerRights == 1) return; if (c.arenas() && c.playerRights == 1) return; for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if ((c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) && c.playerRights == 1) { c.sendMessage("Please remove all your equipment before using this command."); return; } } for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } }

that will check if player is in wildy or duel arena and also make the player unequip all items

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding ::master [317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

This code is for my server Rune Rebirth, so you will have to convert it; if you have any common sense it shouldn’t be hard.

if(cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.addSkillXP(14000000, i); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding ::master [317]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Or even better, use a for loop.

Read full topic
